attributes.action: Refund expenses to ALL VOTERS in the EU referendum, that spent in order to vote
attributes.background: Despite whether you voted 'in' or 'out' of the European Union, the decision to put the final vote to MP's makes your vote on the referendum invalid. Not only would it appear that the public wasted their time, but many thousands will have wasted fuel or transport costs to go out their way to vote.

rejection.details: The expenses that people incur in going to vote are not the responsibility of the UK Government or Parliament.
